attributes.review: This app was okay to start with, but then it started deleting all of my mexican and Black contacts! Eventually it drained my battery like Trump is draining America’s resources. It tried to send me to a summer camp run by Pence to “fix me”. This app is absolutely the most racist, broken app i’ve ever downloaded. I hate it.
attributes.title: Horrible App!

attributes.review: The app took HOURS to download , and then glitched right when I opened it. Impossible to use, it feels like it was designed by a 2nd grader (or at least someone who can read and maybe drink water with one hand) when it did finally open, it prompted me to vote for Joe Biden 2020. Will do Trump 👍🏻
attributes.title: Worst app

attributes.review: there is always some man that looks like a 🍊everywhere i look on the app. this disgusting orange man made me bleach my eyes of how gross he looks. i had to be rushed into a dog hospitals because all the other hospitals were taken by covid 19 patients because this orange man doesn’t know how to handle a country when it comes to a global pandemic. so i rushed to the hospital and no one was able to help me... but then my eyes laid on joe biden... and in that moment... i knew that he is going to be out next president
attributes.title: why do i keep seeing a 🍊 everywhere?

attributes.review: I downloaded this app so I could be graced with 100% real news from our beloved president. When I opened it, it was all fake news. I showed it to my dog, and then he died. Can’t help but think this app was the cause of his death. If you have a dog do not download!
attributes.title: save yourself do not download!

attributes.review: I was trying ever so hard to use the app and it shut down my phone. as i opened it again, it shut down again. i got so mad i destroyed my phone and put it in boiling water! i bought a new phone to write this review. fix the app!!
attributes.title: Very glitchy

attributes.review: at first i didn't understand why people hated this app so much, come to find out the app gives you viruses and takes forever just to download. if you download this app you are completely crazy. there is NO purpose for this app.
attributes.title: terrible

attributes.review: This app took a whole month to download! It also glitches numerous times! My cat almost died by seeing the app and it’s insanely weird. Don’t get this app. Glitchy, takes forever to download and now my storage is full because it took up all of it! NOT RECCOMENDED!
attributes.title: Worst app of all time

attributes.review: It takes more than a somewhat good economy and unemployment rate that makes a good country. America lacks true leadership and the social aspect of our society is broken by the white supremacy in office. Just because you’re not struggling or being oppressed doesn’t mean we aren’t. #biden2020
attributes.title: Common sense

attributes.review: Was so ugly and took so long to get started and it didn’t even work! The app litterally went black and started playing moaning sounds in front of my 2 year old brother! Then X rated content started to appear! Very disgusted and disappointed with this app. Really let me down Mr. Trump 🤡
attributes.title: Horrible app
